dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1279 IS: To redesignate the Hulls Cove Visitor Center at Acadia National Park as the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. King (for himself and Ms. Collins) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the Hulls Cove Visitor Center at Acadia National Park as the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center.

section.header: Redesignation of the Hulls Cove Visitor Center at Acadia National Park as the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center

subsection.text: The Hulls Cove Visitor Center at Acadia National Park located in Bar Harbor, Maine, or any successor to that visitor center that is constructed after the date of enactment of this Act and serves as the primary visitor center for Acadia National Park, shall be known and designated as the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the visitor center referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center.
